mapper.select: select max(rb.id) as id, rb.post_id, u.id as writer_id, u.user_name as writer_name, u.user_role, p.title, max(rb.reporter_id) as reporter_id, (select user_name from user_tb where id = (select max(rb.reporter_id) from dual)) as reporter_name, max(rb.report_img_url) as report_img_url, count(rb.post_id) as report_count, max(rb.report_date) as report_date from report_board rb join post p on rb.post_id = p.id join user_tb u on p.user_id = u.id group by rb.post_id order by report_date desc, report_count desc
